content.raw:
I would wait, if possible, to jenkins testing run before merge. Keep an eye on [gazebo-any run for this branch](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-vrc/28/console) , it should not be very different from the [latest gazebo-1.7 run](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo_1.7/job/gazebo-gazebo_1.7-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-vrc/15/#showFailuresLink)

It can help to detect possible problems with integration of other parts since there were changes in physics/World.
content.html:
I would wait, if possible, to jenkins testing run before merge. Keep an eye on gazebo-any run for this branch , it should not be very different from the latest gazebo-1.7 run

It can help to detect possible problems with integration of other parts since there were changes in physics/World.
